name: BitRome
description:
Fight on the arena against army of Romans. Use their own weapons against them. Each weapon has it's own damage, knockback, attack speed, durability and area of effect, but they break over several usages. Throw them at your enemies to deal some extra damage, and beat copper, silver, gold and mythril enemies in 20 stages of battles!

Controls:

Movement - WSAD

Aim - Move mouse

Attack - Left mouse button

Throw weapon - Right mouse button

Dash - Left Shift

Pause game - ESC

Credits:

Gameplay, graphics, animations: Bartosz Mila
